title: `Teku failed to start` due to `State must be advanced to checkpoint epoch boundary slot`
body:
Updating our nodes, some of those ended up stuck in this state
 
Log message: `Teku failed to start`
 
Stack trace:
 ```
 java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: State must be advanced to checkpoint epoch boundary slot
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:315)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:320)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniCompose.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1159)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(CompletableFuture.java:2179)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateResult$3(SafeFuture.java:146)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:863)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenCompleteStage(CompletableFuture.java:887)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:2357)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:619)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:31)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.propagateResult(SafeFuture.java:141)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$exceptionallyCompose$34(SafeFuture.java:423)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:863)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniWhenComplete.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:841)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(CompletableFuture.java:2179)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateResult$3(SafeFuture.java:146)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:863)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniWhenComplete.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:841)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(CompletableFuture.java:2179)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateToAsync$20(SafeFuture.java:323)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:80)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.AsyncRunner.lambda$runAsync$2(AsyncRunner.java:47)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:72)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$createRunnableForAction$1(ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.java:124)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1144)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:642)
	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1589)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: State must be advanced to checkpoint epoch boundary slot
	at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:143)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.spec.datastructures.state.CheckpointState.<init>(CheckpointState.java:42)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.spec.datastructures.state.CheckpointState.create(CheckpointState.java:56)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.WeakSubjectivityInitializer.validateAnchorIsWithinWeakSubjectivityPeriod(WeakSubjectivityInitializer.java:148)

	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniCompose.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1150)
	... 27 more
```
